name: Wondershare Fantashow Project
summary: Learn about .WFSP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The WFSP file is the main file associated with Fantashow. The file is created when you save your project for the first time. When you are finished with your home movie you can burn it to a DVD or share it through email or to a social site directly from the application.
NOTE: Wondershare Fantashow has been discontinued.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
